entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 7:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -15.1°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
